briefdescription.para: Allow setting every tile, no fixups.
Only allow one unit per press.
Number of icons that are visible at a time.

xrefdescription.para: Support dynamic acceleration of scroll speed.
If the scroll key is longer pressed the area is scrolled faster.

detaileddescription.para: Call each module to clean up. Contrary to CleanModules, maps can be restarted without reloading all lua files.

xrefdescription.para: This function does not support mirror editing!
FIXME: Check if the player has already a start-point.
This function does not support mirror editing!

detaileddescription.para: Calculate the max height and the max width of icons, and assign them to IconHeight and IconWidth

memberdef.argsstring: (std::function< bool(int, int, int, int, int)> forEach)
memberdef.name: forEachPlayerSelectionBoxArea

param.type: std::function< bool(int, int, int, int, int)>

detaileddescription.para: Call the forEach callback with each player icon's <playerNum,x,y,w,h>. Return false to cancel iteration.
Returns the last value returned by forEach. This can be used to detect if an early cancellation of the iteration was requested.
Draw a table with the players

memberdef.argsstring: (std::function< bool(int, ButtonStyle *, int, int, int, int)> forEach)
memberdef.name: forEachUnitIconArea

param.type: std::function< bool(int, ButtonStyle *, int, int, int, int)>

detaileddescription.para: Call the forEach callback with each unit icon's <EditorUnitIndex,ButtonStyle,x,y,w,h>. Return false to cancel iteration;
Returns the last value returned by forEach. This can be used to detect if an early cancellation of the iteration was requested.
Draw unit icons into button area

memberdef.argsstring: (std::function< bool(bool, std::string, int, int, int, int, int)> forEach)
memberdef.name: forEachTileOptionArea

param.type: std::function< bool(bool, std::string, int, int, int, int, int)>

detaileddescription.para: Call the forEach callback with each tile option buttons's <is-active boolean,label string,i,x,y,w,h>. Return false to cancel iteration.
Returns the last value returned by forEach. This can be used to detect if an early cancellation of the iteration was requested.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::function< bool(int, int, int, int, int)> forEach)
memberdef.name: forEachTileIconArea

param.type: std::function< bool(int, int, int, int, int)>

detaileddescription.para: Call the forEach callback with each tile's <EditorTileIndex,x,y,w,h>. Return false to cancel iteration.
Returns the last value returned by forEach. This can be used to detect if an early cancellation of the iteration was requested.
Draw the start locations of all active players on the map
If cursor is on map or minimap show information about the current tile.
Called if mouse button pressed down.

parameterdescription.para: Mouse button number (0 left, 1 middle, 2 right)

detaileddescription.para: Callback for input movement of the cursor.

parameterdescription.para: Save the level to this file.

parameterdescription.para: Map to load, NULL to create a new map
